interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " True Power: Unleashed " from Chika Chosokabe

progression.synopsis: Neither Chika nor Yumi are able to look after Chinami this morning, so Sensei gets recruited instead. Chinami and Sensei spend a while pretending to watch a blank TV. Chinami wants Sensei to marry Chika so that he'll be around more, and claims that Chika talks about having a baby with Sensei. When it's pointed out that marrying Chika wouldn't make him Chinami's daddy, Chinami starts talking to a picture of her late mother, trying to persuade her to marry Sensei. Sensei is uncomfortable, but puts up with it until it's time to go.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.
